content: Keep following the staircases, turning right after the next set to cross the bridge toward the bull guard with the two staffs and the two Flame Rhino Masters.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Rakshasa Palace'.
The content is as follows:
Keep following the staircases, turning right after the next set to cross the bridge toward the bull guard with the two staffs and the two Flame Rhino Masters.
